original_text: Some people teach all kinds of strange new things. Do not let them lead you away from God's true message. It is good that God is very kind to us. That is what makes us strong inside ourselves. Rules about what foods we should eat do not make us strong like that. Those rules have never helped the people who tried to obey them.
korean_text: 여러 가지 다른 교훈에 끌리지 말라 마음은 은혜로써 굳게 함이 아름답고 음식으로써 할 것이 아니니 음식으로 말미암아 행한 자는 유익을 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Some people teach all kinds of strange new things
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 온갖 기묘한 새로운 것들을 가르칩니다

sentences.original_text: Do not let them lead you away
It is good that God is very kind to us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리에게 매우 친절하신 것은 좋은 일입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what makes us strong
Rules about what foods we should eat
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 무슨 음식을 먹어야 하는지에 대한 규칙들은

sentences.original_text: do not make us strong like that

sentences.korean_translation: 그 규칙들은 결코 도움이 된 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: the people who tried to obey them
